latestAction.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

title: To direct the Administrator of General Services to acquire a building located in Terre Haute, Indiana, and for other purposes.

latestAction.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

title: Naming a room in the House of Representatives wing of the Capitol in honor of former Representative G.V. "Sonny" Montgomery.

latestAction.text: Rereferred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service at 30 North 7th Street in Terre Haute, Indiana, as the "John T. Myers Federal Building".

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

title: To redesignate the Federal building located at 107 Federal Building, in Terre Haute, Indiana, as the "John T. Myers Federal Building".

latestAction.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

title: Designating majority membership on certain standing committees of the House.
